title: [Self-directed] Expert-Novice Comparative Analysis Project for Visual Cognitive Skill Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language analysis skills and intermediate domain expertise
context.additional_context: Project-based learning conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, designed for practitioners to acquire expert strategies for interpreting complex visual stimuli.

learning_goals: Learners can identify key elements in dynamic visual stimuli with over 80% accuracy in focused gaze detection.
Learners can reduce analysis time by 20% by applying three or more expert-level knowledge-based heuristic strategies.
Learners can present problem-solving solutions by utilizing heterogeneous task approaches in project deliverables.

resources: Dynamic Visual Stimuli Dataset (Language Pattern Visualization Materials)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
